trans-unit.source: Provides event-related utility methods that register routed events for class owners and add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 提供事件相關公用程式方法，該方法可為類別擁有者註冊路由事件並加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This class is most commonly used to register a new routed event, with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別最常用於新的路由的事件，向<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The second most common [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api](~/includes/tla2sharptla-api-md.md)] usage is <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 第二個最常見[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api](~/includes/tla2sharptla-api-md.md)]使用量<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You use this method to enable class handling of a routed event on the class, or an attached event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法以啟用此類別中的路由的事件的附加的事件的類別處理。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[標示路由傳送事件中當做 Handled，和類別處理](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example show how to use this class to register a new routed event as a class member, along with the routed event "wrapper" technique of overriding the add and remove implementations for a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個類別做為類別成員，以及覆寫新增的路由的事件 「 包裝函式 」 技術註冊新的路由的事件，並移除實作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns identifiers for routed events that have been registered to the event system.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已在事件系統中註冊的路由事件的識別項。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEvent" /> that contains the registered objects.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEvent" /> 的陣列，包含已註冊的物件。

trans-unit.source: More <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEvent> objects can be registered later.
trans-unit.target: 多個<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEvent>稍後登錄物件。

trans-unit.source: This method gets a snapshot and the collection of routed events is writeable throughout an application's lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會取得快照集，且在整個應用程式的存留期可寫入之路由事件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection returned might be quite large.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的集合可能很龐大。

trans-unit.source: Even just counting the events that are part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)], the collection count is in the high hundreds.
trans-unit.target: 即使只有計算事件屬於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]，集合計數為高達數百。

trans-unit.source: The type to start the search with.
trans-unit.target: 要做為搜尋起點的型別。

trans-unit.source: Base classes are included in the search.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別 (Base Class) 會併入搜尋中。

trans-unit.source: Finds all routed event identifiers for events that are registered with the provided owner type.
trans-unit.target: 針對已利用提供的擁有人型別註冊的事件，尋找所有路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: An array of matching routed event identifiers if any match is found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到任何相符合項目，則為相符路由事件識別項的陣列，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Registers a class handler for a particular routed event.
trans-unit.target: 註冊特殊路由事件的類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The type of the class that is declaring class handling.
trans-unit.target: 正要宣告類別處理之類別的型別。

trans-unit.source: The routed event identifier of the event to handle.
trans-unit.target: 要處理之事件的路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the class handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 對類別處理常式實作的參考。

trans-unit.source: Registers a class handler for a particular routed event.
trans-unit.target: 註冊特殊路由事件的類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Class handling is a feature that is available for routed events, including attached events that are implemented with routed event backing.
trans-unit.target: 類別處理是適用於路由的事件，包括與路由事件為基礎實作的附加的事件的功能。

trans-unit.source: A class handler is like a static handler that exists for all instances of the class.
trans-unit.target: 類別處理常式就像是存在類別的所有執行個體的靜態處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Because the handler is static, you cannot change instance properties directly with a class handler, but you can access instances through the `sender` parameter and/or the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因為處理常式是靜態，您無法變更直接與類別處理常式的執行個體屬性但您可以存取透過執行個體`sender`參數及/或事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Class handlers are invoked before instance handlers.
trans-unit.target: 類別處理常式會叫用執行個體的處理常式之前。

trans-unit.source: You can implement a class handler that has the behavior of marking the event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 您可以實作行為是將事件標示為已處理的類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, instance handlers for a class-handled event are not invoked unless the instance handlers register specifically for handled events.
trans-unit.target: 因此，執行個體的類別處理事件的處理常式不會叫用除非特別為已處理的事件註冊執行個體的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Many of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] base element events provide class handling virtual methods.
trans-unit.target: 許多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基底的項目事件提供處理虛擬方法的類別。

trans-unit.source: By overriding these methods in classes that inherit the base classes, you can implement class handling without calling <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A> in static constructors.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由覆寫繼承的基底類別的類別中的這些方法，實作類別處理，而不需呼叫<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>靜態建構函式中。

trans-unit.source: These class handling methods typically exist for input events and have names that start with "On" and end with the name of the event being class handled.
trans-unit.target: 這些類別處理方法通常會針對輸入事件存在，並且具有名稱，以在類別處理事件的名稱以 「 On 」 開頭和結尾。

trans-unit.source: For more information about class handling, see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需類別處理的詳細資訊，請參閱[標示路由傳送事件中當做 Handled，和類別處理](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md)。

trans-unit.source: Using this signature, class handlers will be registered to invoke only in response to unhandled events.
trans-unit.target: 使用此簽章，會叫用只在回應未處理的事件登錄類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: You can also register class handlers to invoke even if the event arguments are marked handled, by using the <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%28System.Type%2CSystem.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> signature, with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以註冊類別處理常式來叫用，即使事件引數會標示為已處理，使用<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%28System.Type%2CSystem.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>簽章，與`handledEventsToo`設`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds a handler for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>, calling <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會加入處理常式<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>，則呼叫<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the class that is declaring class handling.
trans-unit.target: 正要宣告類別處理之類別的型別。

trans-unit.source: The routed event identifier of the event to handle.
trans-unit.target: 要處理之事件的路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the class handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 對類別處理常式實作的參考。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to invoke this class handler even if arguments of the routed event have been marked as handled; <see langword="false" /> to retain the default behavior of not invoking the handler on any marked-handled event.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示即使路由事件的引數已標示為已處理，也要叫用這個類別處理常式，<see langword="false" /> 則表示保留預設行為，即不在任何標示為已處理的事件上叫用處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Registers a class handler for a particular routed event, with the option to handle events where event data is already marked handled.
trans-unit.target: 使用處理事件資料已標示為已處理之事件的選項，註冊特定路由事件的類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Class handling is a feature that is available for routed events, including attached events that are implemented with routed event backing.
trans-unit.target: 類別處理是適用於路由的事件，包括與路由事件為基礎實作的附加的事件的功能。

trans-unit.source: A class handler is like a static handler that exists for all instances of the class.
trans-unit.target: 類別處理常式就像是存在類別的所有執行個體的靜態處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Because the handler is static, you cannot change instance properties directly with a class handler, but you can access instances through the `sender` parameter and/or the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因為處理常式是靜態，您無法變更直接與類別處理常式的執行個體屬性但您可以存取透過執行個體`sender`參數及/或事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Class handlers are invoked before instance handlers.
trans-unit.target: 類別處理常式會叫用執行個體的處理常式之前。

trans-unit.source: You can implement a class handler that has the behavior of marking the event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 您可以實作行為是將事件標示為已處理的類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, instance handlers for a class-handled event are not invoked unless the instance handlers register specifically for handled events.
trans-unit.target: 因此，執行個體的類別處理事件的處理常式不會叫用除非特別為已處理的事件註冊執行個體的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Many of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] base element events provide class handling virtual methods.
trans-unit.target: 許多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基底的項目事件提供處理虛擬方法的類別。

trans-unit.source: By overriding these methods in classes that inherit the base classes, you can implement class handling without calling <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A> in static constructors.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由覆寫繼承的基底類別的類別中的這些方法，實作類別處理，而不需呼叫<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>靜態建構函式中。

trans-unit.source: These class handling methods typically exist for input events and have names that start with "On" and end with the name of the event being class handled.
trans-unit.target: 這些類別處理方法通常會針對輸入事件存在，並且具有名稱，以在類別處理事件的名稱以 「 On 」 開頭和結尾。

trans-unit.source: For more information about class handling, see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需類別處理的詳細資訊，請參閱[標示路由傳送事件中當做 Handled，和類別處理](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md)。

trans-unit.source: Using this signature, class handlers can be registered to invoke upon handled events, by setting `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 使用此簽章，類別處理常式可以登錄設定已處理的事件時叫用`handledEventsToo`設`true`。

trans-unit.source: Generally, you should do this only if there is a known handling issue you are trying to work around, such as input system handling from mouse or keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該執行此作業，這是已知的處理問題，您嘗試解決，例如處理滑鼠或鍵盤事件來自輸入系統。

trans-unit.source: The name of the routed event.
trans-unit.target: 路由事件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name must be unique within the owner type and cannot be <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 這個名稱在擁有人型別中必須是唯一的，而且不能是 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: The routing strategy of the event as a value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 作為列舉值的事件路由策略。

trans-unit.source: The type of the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式的類型。

trans-unit.source: This must be a delegate type and cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這必須是委派型別，而且不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The owner class type of the routed event.
trans-unit.target: 路由事件的擁有者類別類型。

trans-unit.source: This cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Registers a new routed event with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] event system.
trans-unit.target: 以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 事件系統註冊新的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the newly registered routed event.
trans-unit.target: 新註冊路由事件的識別項。

trans-unit.source: This identifier object can now be stored as a static field in a class and then used as a parameter for methods that attach handlers to the event.
trans-unit.target: 這個識別項物件現在可以儲存為類別中的靜態欄位，然後作為附加至事件處理常式之方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: The routed event identifier is also used for other event system [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 路由事件識別項也會用於其他事件系統 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Use the return value of this method to create the static declaration for a unique <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEvent> identifier field.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法的傳回值來建立唯一的靜態宣告<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEvent>識別碼欄位。

trans-unit.source: This field should be stored within the owner type.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位應該儲存在擁有者型別中。

trans-unit.source: There are a considerable number of conventions and best practices associated with how routed events should be named, registered, and exposed in a class.
trans-unit.target: 有相當多的慣例和如何路由事件相關聯的最佳作法應該命名為、 註冊，並公開類別中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。
